item.title: BallWrapper
item.description: View Implementation Any ball in the match. There can be more than one! The best way to get the ball is by getting a ServerWrapper and calling GetGameBalls() float  GetLastTouchTime() PredictionInfo PredictPosition(float timeAhead) Parameter Type Description timeAhead float  — FXActorWrapper GetEndOfGameFXArchetype()
